Changelog
=========

1.0 (2012-06-13)
----------------
- Stable release

0.1.1 (2011-11-28)
------------------

- Documentation update: How to use a TALES expression in a Plone Content Rule
  to check on dates (ExpirationDate, EffectiveDate).

0.1 (2011-11-21)
----------------

- package info changes (setup.py)

0.1dvl (2011-10-26)
-------------------

- Initial release
